content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with Walk Softly, Peter Troy this week. From December 17, 1963, we’ll hear his story, The Repentant Redhead.

(23:35) The Blanche Dermit Murder Case, the December 16, 1952, episode from Broadway Is My Beat is our final story this week.

Download CaseClosed711

Case Closed is made possible by the support of its listeners. If you’re able to help out visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
